class WithPromise{constructor(){this.updateFinished();}get finished(){return this._finished;}updateFinished(){this._finished=new Promise(resolve=>{this.resolve=resolve;});}notifyFinished(){this.resolve();}/**
     * Allows the animation to be awaited.
     *
     * @deprecated Use `finished` instead.
     */then(onResolve,onReject){return this.finished.then(onResolve,onReject);}}export{WithPromise};
